name: SANS FOR572 Logstash
short_description:
This VMware Appliance contains a fully-functional ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana).  The VM was created for the SANS FOR572: Advanced Network Forensics and Analysis course, but is also provided to the community at large.
The configuration is designed to ingest and parse a variety of data formats, and includes several analyst-focused dashboards that display the data and allow analyst interaction.

To get started, see the README here: https://sourceforge.net/p/sansfor572logstash/wiki/Home/
summary: VMware Appliance with fully operational Logstash installation.
